entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet nuget push symbols not working as expected #25958
  • With .NET 6.0.301 installed, the sdk version for Maui/wasm-tools is displayed as "6.0.300" in dotnet workload list. #25673
  • Emre #25202
  • dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only --sdk-version with 6.0.400 do not return results for previous sdk band #25774
  • Add fallback root certificate bundle #25686

Updated

  • Building net*-android apps always restore Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.linux #25679
  • dotnet watch Console.ReadLine() does not read first key stroke #25961
  • Unused Private and Public methods are difficult to discover #24911
  • installed global tool is missing #25767
    Discussion
  • `dotnet sln add` replaces space indentation with tabs #25707
    Backlog
  • Publishing a solution with 6.0 exe and 3.1 classlib to the same target path produces a corrupted output #25226
  • Building a test project with runtime results in either NETSDK1179 or NETSDK1031 #25118
  • .NET Core 3.1 ambiguous call when extending an interface from a nuget package #22836
  • NETSDK1152 Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web Library with package.lock.json during publishing #25294
  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.SourceGenerators.RazorSourceGenerator cannot be created #25254
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts is not incremental #25250
  • A multitargeting project that references 2 projects with the same name under 2 different TFMs fails to compile #25224
  • dotnet workload list --machine-readable with 6.0.400 preview do not list installed workloads from previous sdk band #25772
  • Consider not excluding `.well-known/*` from publishing #25924
  • Task common files should support nullable enable #25920
  • Add Fractions<T> to System.Numerics #25874
  • The --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` and `dotnet watch run` should fallback to a case-insensitive match if a case-sensitive match isn't found #25868
  • Not specifying a value for the --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` results in InvalidOperationException #25867
  • C# Dictionary insertion speed could be improved (performance) #25946
  • No warnings are generated for Trimmed or SingleFile apps when SCD is not specified and rid is specified other than via commandline #25925
  • wasm-tools emscripten has duplicated large libraries #25930
  • Package validation and interface inheritance problem #25888
  • 'dotnet run' command should fail with unknow arguments #23136
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable PublishReadyToRunComposite for R2R singlefile apps #25963
  • Check capitalization for RID #25962
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25957
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25950
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25933
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support suppressions without a diagnostic id #25938
    Area-Compatibility
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix copy&paste mistake in PublicSign preservation #25947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Getting Aot HelloWorld to be warning free #25927
    Area-ILLink
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Don't retarget testhost #25940
